skillTree.localised_description: Dangerous predators with sharp talons and pointed beaks, these giant flying reptiles are surprisingly agile and can spot their prey at great distances.

attributes.bullet_text: This unit frightens all enemy units, reducing their leadership when nearby. It is also immune to fear. Fear penalties do not stack.
This unit provides a leadership bonus to nearby allies. Units within range of both the Lord's aura and an encouraging unit will receive the larger of the two bonuses.
This unit can fly.
When this unit gets hurt it may go on a rampage against nearby enemy units, attacking the closest one and ignoring any orders given.
When this unit gets hurt it may go on a rampage against nearby enemy units, attacking the closest one and ignoring any orders given.

skillTree.localised_description: Mighty, horned, reptilian beasts, Stegadons are naturally armoured with bony scales and spikes protruding from their crests.

attributes.bullet_text: This unit frightens all enemy units, reducing their leadership when nearby. It is also immune to fear. Fear penalties do not stack.
This unit can cause terror, making its melee target rout for a short time. Units that cause terror are immune to terror and fear themselves.
This unit provides a leadership bonus to nearby allies. Units within range of both the Lord's aura and an encouraging unit will receive the larger of the two bonuses.
Allows the unit to attack and destroy walls in melee.
When this unit gets hurt it may go on a rampage against nearby enemy units, attacking the closest one and ignoring any orders given.
When this unit gets hurt it may go on a rampage against nearby enemy units, attacking the closest one and ignoring any orders given.

skillTree.localised_description: Amongst the largest and most ferocious of their race, the eldest Stegadons have thicker hide and larger horns than others of their kind.

attributes.bullet_text: Allows the unit to attack and destroy walls in melee.

This unit can cause terror, making its melee target rout for a short time. Units that cause terror are immune to terror and fear themselves.
This unit provides a leadership bonus to nearby allies. Units within range of both the Lord's aura and an encouraging unit will receive the larger of the two bonuses.
This unit can fire while on the move.
When this unit gets hurt it may go on a rampage against nearby enemy units, attacking the closest one and ignoring any orders given.
When this unit gets hurt it may go on a rampage against nearby enemy units, attacking the closest one and ignoring any orders given.

skillTree.localised_description: Only the eldest, largest and most ferocious of their kind can move the Engines of the Gods!

effects.description: Mount: Ancient Stegadon (Engine of the Gods)

skillTree.localised_description: Lizardmen can move with deceptive speed and agility when they have to.
Across the gulf of space, the serene Potec has shared the secrets of time so that the Lizardmen may protect themselves against supernatural attack.

effects.description:
Ambush defence chance: +5%
	(all units in army)

Ambush defence chance: +10%
	(all units in army)

ui_effects.localised_text: Requires line of sight to the target

skillTree.localised_description: Who wants to live forever? As it turns out, most beings wouldn't say no…

effects.description: When normally killed in action, this Hero will be wounded instead

skillTree.localised_description: Having learned much in their long years of service, this character now turns their attention to training others.

effects.description: Character will share +15% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type
Character will share +30% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type
Character will share +50% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type

skillTree.localised_description: The spellcaster unleashes the beast within, using its fury to transform allies into bestial forms.

effects.description: Winds of Magic cost: -1 for "Wyssan's Wildform"
Winds of Magic cost: -1 for "Wyssan's Wildform Upgraded"
Miscast base chance: -15% for "Wyssan's Wildform Upgraded"

skillTree.localised_description: The spellcaster attunes the magic of the wild, channelling its ancient and arcane power.
With a mighty bellow, the caster invokes Corvus the Crow Lord, summoning his servants to peck at the foe's eyes.

ui_effects.localised_text: Strong vs 25 men unit or above
Strong vs 25 men unit or above
Strong vs 25 men unit or above

effects.description: Winds of Magic cost: -1 for "Flock of Doom"
Winds of Magic cost: -2 for "Flock of Doom Upgraded"
Miscast base chance: -15% for "Flock of Doom Upgraded"

skillTree.localised_description: Calling upon the beast spirits of the wild, the caster sheathes vulnerable flesh in unyielding fur and hide.

effects.description: Winds of Magic cost: -1 for "Pann's Impenetrable Pelt"
Winds of Magic cost: -2 for "Pann's Impenetrable Pelt Upgraded"
Miscast base chance: -15% for "Pann's Impenetrable Pelt Upgraded"

skillTree.localised_description: Sounding a gnarled horn, the caster summons a glowing amber spear and hurls it at the foe with uncanny accuracy.

skillTree.localised_description: Nebulous nature spirits assail the foe, clawing at them with hands not nearly as insubstantial as they appear.

skillTree.localised_description: Kadon, a master of forms, was able to shift his shape into anything he chose. This mastery is used to summon a Manticore, as if Kadon himself fights for you.

ui_effects.localised_text: Spawned unit fights in this battle only
Spawned unit fights in this battle only

effects.description: Winds of Magic cost: -6 for "Transformation of Kadon"

skillTree.localised_description: By stabbing a staff or some arcane conduit into the ground, an accomplished magic-user can earth or tether the Winds and hopefully reduce a chance of miscasting.
A few magic-users have the ability to store the Winds of Magic for later use, increasing their spellcasting power when it really counts.

effects.description:
Winds of Magic power reserve: +1 per turn
	(all units in army)
Winds of Magic power reserve capacity: +5

skillTree.localised_description: Spellcasters can oft-sense when magic is close or being drawn from the Winds.

effects.description: Scouting action: Magic item drop chance is increased by an additional 5%
Scouting action: Magic item drop chance is increased by an additional 10%
Scouting action: Magic item drop chance is increased by an additional 15%

skillTree.localised_description: The locals take notice and will be inspired or frightened into action.

effects.description: Cleanse Corruption action: Corruption is reduced by an additional 1
Cleanse Corruption action: Corruption is reduced by an additional 2
Cleanse Corruption action: Corruption is reduced by an additional 3

skillTree.localised_description: Oft-times, though you may have much, what you want the most is what your rivals have; such envy focuses the mind and creativity.

effects.description: Steal Technology action: Research rate is increased by an additional 3%
Steal Technology action: Research rate is increased by an additional 6%
Steal Technology action: Research rate is increased by an additional 10%

skillTree.localised_description: Such a champion will not bend or break, but slay in their Lord's name.

effects.description: Wound action: Additional 5% chance of wounding target
Wound action: Additional 12% chance of wounding target
Wound action: Additional 21% chance of wounding target

skillTree.localised_description: To sow discord and confuse the enemy, sending them down the wrong route or befuddling their senses.

effects.description: Block Army action: Movement range is modified by an additional -3%
Block Army action: Movement range is modified by an additional -8%
Block Army action: Movement range is modified by an additional -15%

skillTree.localised_description: An expert in their craft, this Hero knows all the mistakes that can be made and how to best avoid making them.

attributes.bullet_text: This unit provides a leadership bonus to nearby allies. Units within range of both the Lord's aura and an encouraging unit will receive the larger of the two bonuses.
This unit can hide in forests until enemy units get too close.
Speed and combat penalties caused by terrain are ignored by this unit.
When this unit gets hurt it may go on a rampage against nearby enemy units, attacking the closest one and ignoring any orders given.
When this unit gets hurt it may go on a rampage against nearby enemy units, attacking the closest one and ignoring any orders given.

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Self-important and opinionated, this one's hubris knows no end.

related_attributes.bullet_text: The unit is immune to psychological attacks (Fear & Terror).

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Self-effacing and unpresuming, he believes that we all have a part to play in the Great Plan, one way or another.
"What are you even for? You're not part of the Great Plan, like all your kind."
"The Plan is the Plan. We shall not deviate or retreat from its path."

effects.description: Hero self-defence: +15% chance of wounding aggressors

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Being fleet of foot is useful in a fight… or when trying to get away afterwards!

related_attributes.bullet_text: Speed and combat penalties caused by terrain are ignored by this unit.

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Deceit is a perfectly acceptable means of attack.

effects.description:
Ambush success chance: +20%
	(armies in local owned region)

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Having a modicum of resolve is useful in a world that continually tests it.

related_attributes.bullet_text: The unit is immune to psychological attacks (Fear & Terror).

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Self-belief is a fine thing when not misplaced.

effects.description:
Experience gain: +5% for units
	(all units in army)

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Always in control, this one leaves no stone unturned and nothing to chance.
Although actually reading minds is not in their skillset, this one has extraordinary insight into the motives of others.
If you're gonna die, you may as well die with your boots on.
Rugged, resistant, and almost unbreakable, this being can and will take on all comers.
What this being doesn't know probably isn't worth knowing, so deep is their interest in the world and its ways.
Sharp minds make sharp blades sharper still.

effects.description: Hero self-defence: +10% chance of wounding aggressors

Ambush defence chance: +10%
	(all units in army)
